definition: to make uniform/to even up/to make good a deficiency
to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: How imaginable you are! Finally you find all the specialties for the whole year.
sentences.chinese: 你们还真有想象力，最后终于把四季美食给找齐了。

sentences.english: The hardest thing was getting all the necessary documents.
sentences.chinese: 最难的是找齐所有必须的证明材料。

sentences.english: Gather all of your cell phone's accessories into one place if you still have them.
sentences.chinese: 如果还能找到话，把手机所有的配件找齐。

sentences.english: He remembered and was able to find everything.
sentences.chinese: 他想起来了并把东西都找齐了。

definition: to collect all the bits to make a whole

to get in hand/to get (one's) hands on/to get hold of (in the sense of to acquire)

to search everywhere/to search high and low/to comb
to find (sth one has been looking for)
to find out/to search out/to uncover/to discover
to get hold of/to obtain/to secure/to come by
to gather (people)/to collect (talent)/to come to an end
to be fair/to be impartial/to settle (a matter etc)
folk remedy
to be all present
